name: Spark Joy Destroy
description:
As my entry for the TV Game jam, this Unity game is based on the recent TV show "Tidying Up with Marie Kondo".

I wanted to go in the opposite direction from the show, and make something that involved trashing a house and gaining points for it, rather than tidying.

The term "Spark Joy" comes from the TV show. I added "Destroy" to make it fit the gameplay better.

Music by Alan Ciccotelli and an instructional screen by Samuel McCulloch (to save my butt at the last minute).

Everything else by me.

Potential updates to come

- Way more stuff to break
- Dynamic & more appropriate music
- Labels for types of damage caused
- Multiplier visuals
- Better variety of SFX
